author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING SPREADING NORTHWARD ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR...
summary: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING SPREADING NORTHWARD ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 5:00 AM MST Wed Sep 03 the center of Lorena was located near 21.9, -111.1 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 990 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
